img_text: We've temporarily limited some of your account features. Nijn @Nlijns What happened? Creating a safer environment for people to freely express themselves is critical to the Twitter community, so if behavior that may violate the Twitter Rules is detected, certain account features become limited. We've detected some potentially abusive behavior from your account, so only your followers can see your activity on Twitter for the amount of time shown below Learn more Your account will be restored to full functionality in: 11 hours and 59 minutes. The countdown will begin once you continue to Twitter Continue to Twitter
